name: Alienscape
description:
In Alienscape, you play as an alien named Blarg.

One day your alien friends hack into Area 51's system.

You have been LET LOOSE  in Area 51.

Find the escape and reunite with your alien friends.

Good luck Blarg.

Developers

maddman0 - art and code

TonyPlanet - art and code

Asimile - music

Super secret dev tool: BACKSPACE to kill all enemies
